content: Please add PR title (or a part of it) to the topic title. This way people will know if they're qualified to review it without following the link.

Sorry... I tried changing the title, but it seems to have split the two threads

https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/144837-PR-reviews/topic/.235195.20--.20Restrict.20ultrafilter.20along.20large.20embedding/near/218854171
I've fixed the title of my reply, now we have 1 thread again.
There's nothing pressing about this PR, just that it's been sitting for a few days with no movement.
I've accidentally deleted the branch. I'll restore it now.
Thanks Yury! The short proofs are indeed much nicer :) I'll deal with bors when the CI checks finish.
